description.ko: 식물과 같은 질감과 유동적인 수중 움직임이 결합된 숨 쉬는 생물 발광 구조를 통해 유기적 생명체를 탐구합니다.
description.en: An exploration of organic life through the lens of a breathing, bioluminescent structure that merges plant-like textures with fluid underwater movement.

prompt: A microscopic view of a breathing organic vessel made of translucent #7FB069 moss and emerald-lit #2D5A3D veins, pulsing with rhythmic liquid light in a deep underwater kelp forest. The structure features heavy subsurface scattering on delicate membranes, with #FFE66D glowing tendrils swaying in the current. Volumetric light shafts pierce the dark water, illuminating #E6F2E1 floating spores. Rendered in Unreal Engine 5 with Octane Render, 8k resolution, cinematic lighting, hyper-realistic textures of the breathing light of nature.
